featured.text: When it rains, a thin layer of fresh water forms on top of the ocean, providing the snakes with a fleeting opportunity to lap up that precious resource.

definition.zh_def: 膝部以上的部分，通常指坐著時大腿上面的區域。
definition.en_def: The upper part of the legs when sitting, typically the area above the knees.
definition.example: She placed the book on her lap while waiting for the bus.
